adjectives.description: southernly (comparative more southernly, superlative most southernly)

adverbs.description: southernly (comparative more southernly, superlative most southernly)

examples: […]  the said river flowed in a southernly direction, and thence around said Dean's Island, and at or about the southwest end thereof the river turned  […]

entries.meaning: In a Southern manner, in a way typical of a Southerner or of the South (the southern United States).
